title: Touch-typing with a stylus
proctitle: CHI '93: Proceedings of the INTERACT '93 and CHI '93 Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: David Goldberg
authors.institution: Xerox Corporation, Palo Alto Research Center, 3333 Coyote Hill Rd, Palo Alto, CA

references.text: Robert Carr and Dan Sharer. The Power of PenPoint, Addison-Wesley, 1991.
John J. Darragh, Ian H. Witten, and Mark L. James, "The reactive keyboard: A predictive typing aid" IEEE Computer, 41-49, Nov 1990.

Scott Ekod, Richard Bruce, Rich Gold, David Goldberg, et, al. "LiveBoard: A large interactive display supporting group meetings, presentations and remote collaborations," Proceedings of the Conference on Computer Human Interaction (CHI), 599-607, May 1992.

David Goldberg and Aaron Goodisman. "Stylus user interfaces for manipulating text." Proceedings of the Fourth Annual A CM Symposium on User Interface Software and Technology (UIST) 127-135, Nov, 1991.
John R. Gregg, Louis A Leslie, and Charles E Zoubek, "Gregg Shorthand Dictionary", MeCa~w-Hill, 1972.
Khaled Kamel and Ibrahim Iman, "A eomputerize~ transcription system for cursive shorthand writing", Proceedings of lEEE SouthEastcon, Knoxville, Tennessee, 336-339, April 1988.
H.S.R. Kao, G. P. van Galen, R. Hoosain (eds) Graphonomics, Contemporary Research in Handwriting, North Holland, 1986.
C.G. Leedham and A. C. Downton, "On-line recognition of Htman's handwritten shorthand--an evaluation of potential," International Journal of Man-Machine Studies, 375-393, 1986.
Bill Machrone, PC Magazine, pp 67-68, January 16, 1990.
Walter S. Mossberg, "Notepad PCs Struggle With One Small Task: Deciphering Writing.", Wall Street Journal, Thursday July 23, 1992.
Greg Nelson (ed.), Systems Programming with Modula- 3, Prentice-Hall, 1991.
R. Plamonden, C. Y. Suen, and M. Simner (eds) Computer Recognition and Human Production of Handwriting, Word Scientific, 1988.
Joe M. Pullis, Speedwriting for Notetaking & Study Skills, Macmillan, 1990.
C. C. Tappert, "Speed, accuracy, flexibility trade-offs in on-line character recognition,", IBM Research Report RC13228, October 1987.
A. J. W. M. P. Thomassen, P. j. G. Keuss, F. P. van Galen (eds), "Motor aspects of handwriting.", Acta Psy. cologica 54 (1-3), 1983.
Harold P. Van Cott and Robert G Kinkade (eds), Human Engineering Guide to Equipment Design, U. S. Government Printing Office, 1972.
Mark Weiser. "The Computer for the 21st Century," Scientific American, 94-104, Sep 1991.
Patrieia D. Whitman, "An Evaluation of four shorthand systems after one year of instruction", Ed.D dissertation, University of Southern California, 1984.
